setup._adminEmail_desc: E-Mail address of the initial admin
setup._initialAdminPassword_desc: Initial password for the initial admin. You will have to change it afterwards.

frontend._requiredContactFields: Fields that users have to enter to submit. Possible values: ['address', 'city', 'country', 'email', 'firstName', 'lastName', 'phone', 'random', 'zip']

server._bind_desc: Bind server on this in ip address
server._cert_desc: Required certificate files for https mode
